Package.Name: ayatana-libappindicator
Package.Summary: A library to allow applications to export a menu into the Unity Menu bar.
Package.Description: A library to allow applications to export a menu into the Unity Menu bar.

Package.Name: ayatana-ido
Package.Summary: A set of symbols and convience functions that all indicators would like to use.
Package.Description: Libary with a set of symbols and convience functions that all indicators would like to use (GTK+ 2 library)

Package.Name: ayatana-libindicator
Package.Summary: Ayatana Indicators Shared Library.
Package.Description: The Ayatana Indicators project is the continuation of Application Indicators and System Indicators, two technologies developed by Canonical Ltd. for the Unity7 desktop.

Package.Name: claws-mail
Package.Summary: Claws Mail is an email client (and news reader), based on GTK+.
Package.Description: Claws Mail is a lightweight and highly configurable email client and news reader based on the GTK+ GUI toolkit.

Package.Name: diodon
Package.Summary: Clipboard manager.
Package.Description: Aiming to be the best integrated clipboard manager for the Unity desktop.

Package.Name: gtkhash-plugin-schema
Package.Summary: A cross-platform desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums.
Package.Description: GtkHash is a desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums. Most well-known hash functions are supported, including MD5, SHA1, SHA2 (SHA256/SHA512), SHA3 and BLAKE2.

Package.Name: gtkhash
Package.Summary: A cross-platform desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums.
Package.Description: GtkHash is a desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums. Most well-known hash functions are supported, including MD5, SHA1, SHA2 (SHA256/SHA512), SHA3 and BLAKE2.

Package.Name: handbrake
Package.Summary: The open source video transcoder.
Çoklu görev destekli video kodlama/düzenleme aracı
Package.Description: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs. The program is also used to convert DVDs so they can be viewed on iPods, iPhones and most media players.
Handbrake,Video dosyalarını portatif medya oynatıcıları için düzenleyebilmenin yanısıra çözünürlülük değişimi desteğide sunan özgür video kodlama ve düzenleme aracıdır.

Package.Name: lxappearance
Package.Summary: A new feature-rich GTK+ theme switcher.
Package.Description: LXAppearance is a new GTK+ theme switcher developed for project LXDE.

Package.Name: lxterminal
Package.Summary: Lightweight terminal emulator.
Package.Description: Lxterminal is a Lightweight vte-based tabbed terminal emulator for LXDE.

Package.Name: lxtask
Package.Summary: LXDE Task manager.
Package.Description: Lxtask is a lightweight and desktop independent task manager.

Package.Name: lf
Package.Summary: Terminal file manager
Package.Description: lf is a terminal file manager.

Package.Name: lxsession
Package.Summary: LXDE session manager.
Package.Description: lxsession is the default X11 session manager of LXDE.

Package.Name: lxrandr
Package.Summary: LXDE GUI interface to RandR extention.
Package.Description: lxrandr is a LXDE GUI interface to RandR extention.

Package.Name: lxinput
Package.Summary: LXDE keyboard and mouse configuration tool.
Package.Description: lxinput is tool for LXDE keyboard and mouse configuration.

Package.Name: lxde-common
Package.Summary: LXDE Session default configuration files.
Package.Description: lxde-common provides LXDE Session default configuration files and nuoveXT2 iconset.

Package.Name: lxhotkey
Package.Summary: A lightweight global keyboard shortcuts configurator.
Package.Description: LXHotkey is an universal application for the Lightweight X11 Desktop Environment (LXDE) which allows view and change global keyboard shortcuts for Window Manager actions, including ones to start applications.

Package.Name: lxpanel
Package.Summary: Lightweight X11 desktop panel for LXDE.
Package.Description: lxpanel is a lightweight X11 desktop panel for LXDE.

Package.Name: lxmenu-data
Package.Summary: Menu data files for LXDE.
Package.Description: lxmenu-data provides files needed for LXDE application menus.

Package.Name: libb2
Package.Summary: C library providing BLAKE2b, BLAKE2s, BLAKE2bp, BLAKE2sp.
Package.Description: C library providing BLAKE2b, BLAKE2s, BLAKE2bp, BLAKE2sp.

Package.Name: libetpan
Package.Summary: A portable middleware for email access.
Package.Description: The purpose of this mail library is to provide a portable, efficient framework for different kinds of mail access: IMAP, SMTP, POP and NNTP.

Package.Name: libfm
Package.Summary: Library for file management.
Package.Description: libfm is a LXDE library for file management.

Package.Name: libxdg-basedir
Package.Summary: libxdg-basedir is an implementation of the XDG Base Directory specifications.
Package.Description: libxdg-basedir is an implementation of the XDG Base Directory specifications.

Package.Name: modem-manager-gui
Package.Summary: Modem Manager GUI is a simple GTK based graphical interface.
Package.Description: Modem Manager GUI is a simple GTK based graphical interface compatible with Modem manager, Wader and oFono system services able to control EDGE/3G/4G broadband modem specific functions. You can check balance of your SIM card, send or receive SMS messages, control mobile traffic consuption and more using Modem Manager GUI.

Package.Name: mocp
Package.Summary: Music On Console Player.
Package.Description: MOC (music on console) is a console audio player for Linux/Unix designed to be powerful and easy to use.

Package.Name: milton
Package.Summary: An infinite-canvas paint program.
Package.Description: Milton is an open source application that lets you Just Paint. There are no pixels, you can paint with (almost) infinite detail. It feels raster-based but it works with vectors. It is not an image editor. It is not a vector graphics editor. It is a program that lets you draw, sketch and paint. There is no save button, your work is persistent with unlimited undo.

Package.Name: obconf
Package.Summary: Openbox configuration tool.
Package.Description: Openbox Configuration Manager.

Package.Name: pcmanfm
Package.Summary: LXDE default file manager.
Package.Description: PCMan File Manager is an extremly fast and lightweight file manager for LXDE.

Package.Name: pybookreader
Package.Summary: Book Reader
Package.Description: PyBookReader is a Book Reader for Linux/FreeBSD/other operation systems.

Package.Name: picom
Package.Summary: A compositor for X11.
Package.Description: This is forked from the original Compton because it seems to have become unmaintained.

Package.Name: radiotray-ng
Package.Summary: Radiotray-NG: An Internet radio player for Linux.
Package.Description: It became clear as one of the early contributors to the RadioTray project that it was not getting the attention it required and was probably dead. A lot of the technologies it used had moved on to newer versions and the bugs started piling up. I did my best to help users, but a new start was required.

Package.Name: simple-fb2-reader
Package.Summary: Simple FB2 book reader on GTK+3
Package.Description: Simple tool to read FB2 books. Developed using GTK+3.

Package.Name: tilda
Package.Summary: A Gtk based drop down terminal for Linux and Unix.
Package.Description: Tilda is a terminal emulator and can be compared with other popular terminal emulators such as gnome-terminal (Gnome), Konsole (KDE), xterm and many others. The specialities of Tilda are that it does not behave like a normal window but instead it can be pulled up and down from the top of the screen with a special hotkey. Additionally Tilda is highly configurable. It is possible to configure the hotkeys for keybindings, change the appearance and many options that affect the behavior of Tilda.

Package.Name: transmission-gtk
Package.Summary: Transmission's GTK+ interface (default).
Transmission'un öntanımlı GTK+ arayüz istemcisi
Package.Description: Transmission is a free, lightweight Bittorrent client. It features a simple, intuitive interface on top of an efficient backend. This package provides only daemon, web interface and command line client. If you want use Transmission with graphical interface, you should install transmission-gtk or transmission-qt.

Transmission özgür ve hafif BitTorrent istemcisidir. İki değişik kitaplıkla yazılmış basit ve kullanışlı arayüz istemcisi vardır. Qt ile yazılmış arayüz paketinin adı transmission-qt, GTK+ ile yazılmış olanı ise transmission-gtk'dir. Bu pakette sadece servis, komut satırı istemcisi ve Web arayüzü bulunmaktadır.

Package.Name: transcode
Package.Summary: Converter tool for several video and audio formats
Çeşitli görüntü ve ses kodlayıcıları için dönüştürme araçları
Package.Description: Transcode is a suite of command line utilities for transcoding video and audio codecs, and for converting beween different container formats. Transcode can decode, encode and convert many audio and video formats into one another.

Transcode, video ve ses dosyalarını değişik içerik formatlarına dönüştürmek için kullanılabilecek komut satırı araçları paketidir. Transcode MPEG-1/2, MPEG-4, DivX ve XviD, Quicktime/MPEG-PS, MPEG-1-layer-1/2/3 audio, AC3 gibi birçok ses ve görüntü formatını birbirine çevirebilir.

Package.Name: thunar-gtkhash-plugin
Package.Summary: A cross-platform desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums.
Package.Description: GtkHash is a desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums. Most well-known hash functions are supported, including MD5, SHA1, SHA2 (SHA256/SHA512), SHA3 and BLAKE2.

Package.Name: transmission-cli
Package.Summary: Transmission's cli tools, web interface and daemon.
Transmission'un öntanımlı CLI, web ve sunucu bileşenleri
Package.Description: Transmission is a free, lightweight Bittorrent client. It features a simple, intuitive interface on top of an efficient backend. This package provides only daemon, web interface and command line client. If you want use Transmission with graphical interface, you should install transmission-gtk or transmission-qt.

Transmission özgür ve hafif BitTorrent istemcisidir. İki değişik kitaplıkla yazılmış basit ve kullanışlı arayüz istemcisi vardır. Qt ile yazılmış arayüz paketinin adı transmission-qt, GTK+ ile yazılmış olanı ise transmission-gtk'dir. Bu pakette sadece servis, komut satırı istemcisi ve Web arayüzü bulunmaktadır.

Package.Name: uthash
Package.Summary: A hash table for C structures.
Package.Description: Any C structure can be stored in a hash table using uthash. Just add a UT_hash_handle to the structure and choose one or more fields in your structure to act as the key. Then use these macros to store, retrieve or delete items from the hash table.

Package.Name: ymuse
Package.Summary: Easy, functional, and snappy client for Music Player Daemon.
Package.Description: Ymuse is an easy, functional, and snappy GTK front-end (client) for Music Player Daemon written in Go.

Package.Name: zeitgeist
Package.Summary: Activity logging framework.
Package.Description: Zeitgeist is a service which logs the users's activities and events (files opened, websites visites, conversations held with other people, etc.) and makes relevant information available to other applications.
